name: Sides Adventures
description:
You must survive, and your room is your only friend ...
Sides Adventure is an action/survival game, in which you wake up in your own room, which is itself in the middle of the ocean and try to survive as long as possible by controling your room with different tools.

/!\ Compo entry /!\

Controls :

- Arrow keys to move (or dpad/left stick with a gamepad)

- C to get onto an item (X button)

- V (or space) to use an item (A button)

Made in 48h with GameMaker !
